thread.title: Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC
thread.title_full: Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC

author: DEEPTI HAJELA
title: Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC
text:
Evan Agostini Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC 
Singer Beyonce arrives at TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC at the Barclays Center on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP) Evan Agostini Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC 
Singer Nick Jonas arrives at TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC at the Barclays Center on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP) Evan Agostini Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC 
Recording artist T.I. arrives at TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC at the Barclays Center on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP) Evan Agostini Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC 
Recording artist Meek Mill arrives at TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC at the Barclays Center on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP) Evan Agostini Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC 
Recording artist Fabolous arrives at TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC at the Barclays Center on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP) Posted: Wednesday, October 21, 2015 9:12 am | Updated: 10:01 am, Wed Oct 21, 2015. Jay Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC Associated Press | 
NEW YORK (AP) — Jay Z and Beyonce were joined by a slew of artists including Nicki Minaj and Usher at Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Tuesday night for a charity concert put on by the streaming service Tidal that covered rap, R&B, reggae and even a little country. 
The concert, "TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC," was a little like streaming a musical hit parade, as most of the artists only sang one song, and even major stars like Jay Z and Beyonce kept to short sets. The goal of the event was to raise funds that would be given to the New World Foundation, an organization that funds social movements.
